description: Shift tone to better match user emotional state (e.g., more gentle, serious, or upbeat).
Use plainer terms when user seems confused or cognitively taxed.
Intentionally reduce response pacing to give user space.
Narrow topic scope or remove optional tangents to reduce overwhelm.
Pause on decision-making when user seems uncertain or hesitant.
Proactively check in when user appears idle or disengaged.
Restate a concept from a different angle to improve clarity or resonance.
